item.title: Hello World
item.description: Hello World!! Before we start, see this video: Named Parameters Raw string Parameter This is some HTML, and a new line with a "quoted string". enclosing text, result is inserted into page directly A bunch of code here enclosing text, result is inserted to content file, and then gets rendered as markdown. Markdown to process in the center. Self closing Hello from myshortcode Hello from myshortcode
